act.title: THE MUSSALMAN WAKF VALIDATING ACT, 1930
act.article: 1 Short title.—This Act may be called the Mussalman Wakf Validating Act, 1930.

2 Act 6 of 1913 to apply retrospectively.—The Mussalman Wakf Validating Act, 1913, shall be deemed to apply to wakfs created before its commencement: Provided that nothing herein contained shall be deemed in any way to affect any right, title, obligation or liability already acquired, accrued or incurred before the commencement of this Act.
